ks_appends.ks_append:
%post --log=/root/my-ks-post.log
verx=$(rpm -E %rhel) case $verx in 8|9) [[ "$verx" = 8 ]] && R8=-RHEL-8 read dtype distro <<< $(awk -F/+ '/^baseurl/ { for (i=3;i<NF;i++) { if ($(i+1) ~ /RHEL-/) { d=$(i+1) if (d ~ /RHEL-[0-9]$/) d=$(i+2) print($i, d) break } } }' /etc/yum.repos.d/beaker-BaseOS.repo) dtype=nightly read prefix ver time <<< ${distro//-/ } buildrootUrl=http://download.devel.redhat.com/rhel-$verx/$dtype/BUILDROOT-$verx/latest-BUILDROOT-$ver$R8/compose/Buildroot/$(arch)/os cat <<-EOF >/etc/yum.repos.d/beaker-buildroot.repo [beaker-buildroot] name=beaker-buildroot baseurl=$buildrootUrl enabled=0 gpgcheck=0 skip_if_unavailable=1 EOF ;; esac
yum install --setopt=strict=0 -y git patch gcc wget bzip2 screen bc redhat-lsb-core sg3_utils sg3_utils-libs sg3_utils-devel rsyslog python2 guestfs-tools yum install --setopt=strict=0 -y libnsl2 libtirpc-devel python2-lxml python3-lxml pciutils yum -y install https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-8.noarch.rpm sed -i s/metalink?repo=epel-\$releasever/metalink?repo=epel-8/ /etc/yum.repos.d/epel.repo sed -i s/metalink?repo=epel-modular-\$releasever/metalink?repo=epel-modular-8/ /etc/yum.repos.d/epel-modular.repo setenforce 0 #yum update -y pkg1 pkg2 --nogpgcheck --repofrompath=abc,http://x.y.z/path/to/repo %end
